shinyB2AIDashboard 0.1.1

    Works from a single ORCID

    works_from_orcid.Rd

    Fetch a (simplified) set of works (publications, etc) from an ORCID.

    Usage

    works_from_orcid(orcid)

    Arguments

    orcid

    character(1) an orcid is required

    Value

    a dataframe (see example)

    See also

    Other orcid: .extract_simple_details_from_work_record(), orcid_work_detail(), orcid_works_json()

    Other bibliography: .extract_simple_details_from_work_record(), orcid_work_detail(), orcid_works_json()

    Examples

    orcid = '0000-0001-5643-4068'

df = works_from_orcid(orcid)
dim(df)
#> [1] 35  6
head(df)
#>                                                                                                 title
#> 1                             IGD: high-performance search for large-scale genomic interval datasets.
#> 2                                                     Bedshift: perturbation of genomic interval sets
#> 3 Chromatin conformation capture (Hi-C) sequencing of patient-derived xenografts: analysis guidelines
#> 4                                                               Expanding the Galaxy’s reference data
#> 5             Linking big biomedical datasets to modular analysis with Portable Encapsulated Projects
#> 6                                      PEPATAC: An optimized ATAC-seq pipeline with serial alignments
#>                               doi     pmid  pmc put_code               orcid
#> 1 10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa1062 33367484 <NA> 89488967 0000-0001-5643-4068
#> 2       10.1101/2020.11.11.378554     <NA> <NA> 89488968 0000-0001-5643-4068
#> 3       10.1101/2020.10.17.343814     <NA> <NA> 89488971 0000-0001-5643-4068
#> 4       10.1101/2020.10.09.327114     <NA> <NA> 89488972 0000-0001-5643-4068
#> 5       10.1101/2020.10.08.331322     <NA> <NA> 89488973 0000-0001-5643-4068
#> 6       10.1101/2020.10.21.347054     <NA> <NA> 89488969 0000-0001-5643-4068
summary(df)
#>     title               doi                pmid               pmc           
#>  Length:35          Length:35          Length:35          Length:35         
#>  Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   Class :character  
#>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character  
#>                                                                             
#>                                                                             
#>                                                                             
#>     put_code           orcid          
#>  Min.   : 9769301   Length:35

#>  Median :41143885   Mode  :character
